page.title: 05NATURE WALKS IN N.BRISTOL
page.content: Through{Blaise Woods}the{Hazel Brook gorge is a naturalists dream sustaining flora & fauna diverse & profuse.It is corporation-owned & has good foot-paths.Blaise Parkland is beautifully wooded & abounds with squirrels.From Southmead the Trym flows through Badock Wood & Westbury {Wildlife Park}where indigenous creatures are protected.Rivers & streams run through housing estates between grassy banks & open spaces. Here too there is an abundance of species on land & in rivers.Sadly in the east the rivers become polluted by household junk & planting schemes are ruined by vandalism but{conservation development goes on at Doncaster Rd School.The air is clean due to lack of industry.An urban fox watch scheme is in process & our two parks offer educational lectures & training.
